metadata.title: CVE-2016-6347 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the default exception handlerin RESTEasy allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia unspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: resteasy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
